message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,750. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,750 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, at $10,875. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
